CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1945, Page 23 reads: "First Timers--The faithful came out en masse on Christmas Eve to be on hand for the official opening of the Continental Bar in Crawford Grill No. 2. Top: Hugh Smith gives a bit of Christmas cheer to his friends. Billy Potter (right) came all the way from New York for the occasion."
TitMainTitle: Group, including Hugh or Hughey Smith in center wearing light colored cap and holding cigar, and Billy Potter on right, in Continental Bar of Crawford Grill No. 1
